Name: Baneful Bunker
Effect: Target Self. Reaction 4. Shield Move. Reduce 3 Damage the User would receive from a Damaging Move. *If the Foe used a Non-Ranged Physical Move against the user, Poison the foe.
Description: The user encloses themselves inside a sturdy shell covered by poisonous barbs, if a barb pinches the Targetâ€™s skin, the wound will start to fester
